attributes.action: Freeze MP's pay for at least ten years and end final salary pension schemes for new MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have had enough of MP's hugely generous pay rises and pension pots. Many ordinary people in this country work for much less pay and receive pitiful pay increases. We are sick and tired of getting by and making do  while at times you lot appear to fall asleep at work and vote yourselves nice increases in pay.

rejection.details: You should contact Parliament directly on this matter.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
